commit-log:
- Use Chrome Custom Tabs instead of an external browser (Less crashes),
Fixed crash when trying to open comments,
Renamed some resource files,
Fixed wrong spacing in settings,
Black navigation bar in an amoled theme
Rename "watch" tab into "read" if opened manga,
Use onSettingChange(SettingsItem newItem, SettingsItem oldItem) instead of onSettingChange(SettingsItem item, int position),
Removed unnecessary SettingsActivity.activityResultLauncher,
Use Material3 theme for PopupMenu ~MrBoomDev

workflow.title: Use Chrome Custom Tabs instead of an external browser (Less crashes),
